title: Happy Birthday, Mari-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Mari-chan, happy birthday~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Thank you, Kanata!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hey, hey. Can I tell you about the birthday cake?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Oh, shouldn’t you keep it hidden from me for now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I was thinking about keeping it a secret. But~ Kanata-chan can’t hide it from you anymore because it’s the most spectacular cake Kanata-chan has ever made!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wow! You’ve caught Mari’s interest. What kind of cake did you decide to make?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Well, it was inspired by your favorite music genre, Mari-chan......!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata-chan studied the history of industrial metal music, so get ready...... to see Kanata-chan’s interpretation of industrial metal!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I would never have been able to guess that! Come on, let’s head over to the party venue now, Kanata!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
